name: Floaty Square (TechGamesPlus)
description:
Floaty Square is a Flappy Bird like game, where you float passed objects and try not to die, while listening to catchy music. (Thanks again Alon)

Instructions:
Click to float up
Goal: Don't Die

Note: On extraction you will find 3 versions of the game
9-16 : Resolution set for a phone
4-3 : Resolution of 1024x768
16-9HD : Resolution of 1920x1080 (finally a game in HD :wozchamp: )
